title: Luxury House for Sale in Lake Road [HS8]
details:
Under Construction - Completion In July 2018

A beautifully designed 3-storey house located approx. 2 km from the Pelawatte Junction, within close proximity to all modern day conveniences. Accessible via a 15-20 foot access road, the property resides in a quiet residential neighborhood.

The property offers extensive living space along with four bedrooms and three bathrooms. The house features a spacious living & dining area, separate pantry & wet kitchen, double garage, maids quarters, rooftop terrace and landscaped gardens.

Ground Floor Plan
- Living & dining area open to the exterior garden
- Guest bedroom & common washroom
- Pantry and separate kitchen
- Enclosed parking space for 2 vehicles
- Maids quarters

1st Floor Plan
- TV Lobby
- Master bedroom with walk-in closet & attached bathroom with access to private terrace
- Two additional bedrooms with common washroom

2nd Floor Plan
- Expansive rooftop terrace

Starting Price: LKR 46.5 Million Upwards
